extendedInfo.description: - Multiple word bankscode base checkout fully compiles now; open sourced under GPLFeedback Welcome; email/mailing list

reviews.title: Pedro
reviews.comment: I used to love this app. Now it won\'t even let me choose a letter to mark a word. :/ I touch one letter and it marks one 3 rows over.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Fun and well done
reviews.comment: Great app, very well done, plenty of fun to be had
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Awesome app
reviews.comment: This is probably the best wordsearch app I\'ve downloaded, although it is a little easy. Nice time-killer though. Although, ignoring all that, I did have to unistall it because I went into the word bank by accident, and it wouldnt let me back to the actual wordsearch. An extremely annoying glitch.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Very easy to use but if you have big/fat fingers it can be very sensitive!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Great Time Waster!
reviews.comment: Fun app, especially when you need to burn some time between meetings!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: GO
reviews.comment: Clean, simple interface. Fun to play
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Honeycomb problems
reviews.comment: Excellent word search game. Unfortunately, when my tablet  upgraded to honeycomb, tracing words became very difficult. Now, it picks up letters on a different row than the row I am highlighting.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Nene2good
reviews.comment: I love it :) its fun
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Great potential
reviews.comment: I love this app\'s custom word database, but, unfortunately, selecting words is next to impossible. Xoom.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Pass the time
reviews.comment: When you can\'t sleep a wink; word searches are a great way to pass time. 0402
reviews.author: Alicia McFarlane

reviews.title: Hopeless!
reviews.comment: What a shame, it could be good but it takes way too long to enter your word as the touch sensor barely works!!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Time-Killer
reviews.comment: This app is so simple and fun. It is amazing at killing time when you\'re bored or when you\'re in one of those long car journeys ... There is also some settings that adjust the background to your preference ...
reviews.author: Seffana Mohamed Ajaz

reviews.comment: I made global list three times on my sisters phone and it didnt post on the global list....lame
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: For those having trouble with wordlist: you can find words out of order if they are on list or turn phone sideways to see the entire wordlist at once.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Needs 4.1 support
reviews.comment: Great app but have seen a couple of bugs with jelly bean 4.1
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Works great
reviews.comment: Perfect for rooted nook color. Drag doesn\'t work too well but tap works perfectly. Rotate screen to get list of all the words. Its nice that it moves found words to the bottom. Random mode is not that random.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Nice, but entirely too easy.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: What happened to this???
reviews.comment: This used to be fun to play until today!  I went to find a word and when I did...had a very hard time selecting it.  I have it set on drag and it\'s just about impossible now!  What happened to this?  I\'m lowering to 1 star...O stars if could...until the developers fix this problem.  Please fix it asap!  This is on the Motorola Droid Razr Maxx.  It\'s kinda like it doesn\'t know where I\'m pointing or selecting etc.  Fix this and my rating will go back up.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: The white on black is horrid. Hurts my eyes. Once all the other colours are up its fine, shame cos otherwise its a good game.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Same issue
reviews.comment: Same problem not selecting words im touching. No point having. Just look for another, many good ones out there.
reviews.author: Hailo G
